items.title: cabbage and halloumi skewers
items.excerpt: Every September, I step up onto my soapbox to report for my self-appointed duty — one part desperate, one part cantankerous — to remind us that summer isn’t over yet. I beg us to put away the decorative gourds and pumpkin spice for just a tiny bit longer. It’s a slippery slope…

items.title: Apple Pancakes
items.excerpt: This apple pancake recipe features freshly grated apple and ground cinnamon. These apple pancakes are wholesome, delicious and easy to make!

items.excerpt: A cottage cheese pancake with a souffle-like texture with a golden, buttery edge and fluffy rich insides. SO GOOD. And 15 grams of protein, too!
